representation_information.name: XLSX Strict, (Office Open XML, Spreadsheet ML) ISO 29500:2008-2012, also ECMA-376, Editions 2-4.
representation_information.description: A format for spreadsheet documents in the Open Office XML (ISO 29500) format family, developed originally by Microsoft. Specified in part 1 of ISO/IEC 29500, Information technology -- Document description and processing languages -- Office Open XML File Formats (OOXML). Excel 2010 could read XLSX Strict documents; Excel 2013 can read and write XLSX Strict documents.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
